inn1.comm: good length on leg stump, flicked away wide of square leg for a single. Tharanga off the mark straightaway
good length outside off, left alone
short of a good length outside off, opens the face to run it down to third man, cannot get it past second slip
back of a length outside off and angling away, left alone
good length on middle and moving away a touch after pitching, defends it on the front foot back to the bowler
short of a good length outside off, plays away from the body to push it off the back foot towards point
shot! full, juicy half-volley outside off, driven on the front foot wide of mid-off for a boundary
held it back this time, punched off the back foot to cover
coming in this time, good length on the off and moving towards middle after pitching, defended watchfully off the back foot to the bowler
short of a good length on the off stump, defended towards cover
good length outside off, Tharanga gets on the front foot to defend, gets an outside edge that falls short of first slip.
beaten! good length outside off, comes forward to defend but the ball swings away a touch as he presents the full face of the bat.
back of a length on the off stump, dropped onto the off side off the back foot
short of a good length on the off stump, turned to midwicket
fuller on the off stump, gets forward and defends to cover
short of a good length outside off, tries to cut, chops it down short of the keeper
back of a length on off, defends it back to the bowler
full outside off, pushed to cover off the front foot
short of a good length outside off, holding its line, left alone
full on middle and off, pushed off the front foot to extra cover
short outside off, cut away to third man for a single
gone! full outside off, there to drive, gets on the front foot and pushes it uppishly towards cover where Usteya dives forward to complete a good catch.
good length on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on
full outside off, tries to defend but the ball goes straight through, Taibu fumbles behind the stumps to allow the batsmen two byes
short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover
good length outside off, gets a stride forward to defend on the off side, the ball escapes the outside edge
short of a good length outside off, chopped down to point
full on the off stump, driven firmly to mid-off
short of a good length outside off, pushed to point off the back foot
good length outside off, left alone to the keeper
dropped, short and wide, Sangakkara tries to cut it away through point, gets an under-edge that Taibu fails to collect behind the stumps.
short and wide again, Sangakkara has nothing to do with it this time
good length on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
fuller on middle and off, defended on the front foot to mid-off
full on the off stump, driven back to the bowler who fields well on his follow-through
full on middle and leg, driven straight to midwicket
short of a good length on leg stump, tries to turn it away towards square leg, is hit high on the pads
bowled on a good length outside off, left alone to the keeper
good length on the off stump, pushed to mid-off
full outside off, tries to drive it through the covers, the bat turns in his hand and the ball goes towards mid-on
back of a length outside off, pushed to cover
short of a good length outside off, looks to defend it off the back foot, gets an inside edge on the pads and onto the stumps. Sri Lanka struggling here!
short of a good length outside off, pushed to cover on the front foot
full outside off, tries to play an expansive drive over the covers, misses
runs finally! full on the pads, glanced down to fine leg
good length on leg stump, worked away wide of square leg for a quick single
full on middle and leg, glanced down to fine leg
good length on the off stump, defended to cover on the front foot
good length on middle and off, gets on the back foot and turns it away to fine leg for a single
short of a good length on the off stump, tries to defend on the back foot, gets a thick outside edge towards point
fuller outside off and swings away after pitching, left alone to the keeper
full on the off stump, pushed to mid-off
back of a length outside off, looks to run it down to third man, gets a thick outside edge that just manages to evade a diving gully
short of a good length on the off stump, defended to mid-on on the back foot
full and wide, given
full on middle and leg, turned away wide of fine leg for a couple
good length on the off stump, defended on the front foot to cover
full on middle and off, comes forward to defend, gets an inside edge onto his pads
full on middle and off, defended on the front foot
full outside off, squeezed down to third man for a single
short of a good length on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
wide down the leg side
good length on middle and leg, drifting down, tries to glance it fine, is struck on the pads
short of a good length on middle and leg, tries to whip it away off his pads, misses and is struck on the thigh
short of a good length on the off stump, pushed to midwicket on the front foot
full on middle, driven straight to mid-off
short of a good length on the off stump, defended on the back foot to the bowler
good length outside the off stump, left alone, good carry to the keeper
full on the off stump, driven straight to mid-off
beaten! short of a good length outside off, tries to defend it on the front foot, misses
short of a good length on leg stump, flicked away wide of midwicket for a couple
good length on middle and leg, tries to defend it back to the bowler, gets a thick outside edge towards point
good length outside off, punched firmly to cover where Matsikenyeri dives to his right to keep the batsmen to a single
full on middle and off, defended to cover
short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover
short and wide, cut away to third man for a single
good length on middle, worked away wide of midwicket
full outside off, trying to induce Sangakkara into the drive, but he leaves it alone
short of a good length outside leg, Sangakkara tries to flick it away fine, misses, not given a wide, rather surprising
short of a good length on middle and off, tries to defend it off the back foot, gets an outside edge that falls well short of first slip
full on middle and leg, flicked uppishly but straight to Matsikenyeri at midwicket who makes no mistake. Sri Lanka continue to struggle.
short and wide, left alone to the keeper
full and wide, opens the face to guide it to point
full on the off stump, guided to third man for a single
shot! full and wide, driven wide of mid-off, Keith Dabengwa chases well to drag the ball back just short of the boundary
good length on the off stump, dropped onto the off side
good length on middle and off, defended
full on middle and leg, turned to fine leg
short of a good length on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
full and wide this time, driven firmly wide of cover, deep point runs to his left and keeps the batsmen to a couple
good length on middle and leg, flicked wide of midwicket for a couple more
short of a good length outside off, cut away wide of point for a single to third man
bowled flat and middle off, dropped onto the leg side for a quick single
flighted outside leg from round the wicket, turns towards middle, tries to turn it away towards square leg, is struck on the pads
tossed up on middle and leg, worked away wide of square leg for a single
on middle, dropped onto the leg side, short of midwicket, for a quick single
full on middle and leg, turned towards midwicket
flighted on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
good length outside off, a little too wide, left alone
full and wide, given again, struggling with his direction here
down the leg side now, three consecutive wides, easy runs for Sri Lanka
bowled full on the pads from round the wicket, flicked away wide of fine leg for a couple
full on middle and leg, driven on the front foot wide of mid-on for a single
wide outside off again, the fourth of the over
and again, Chigumbura struggling big time here
back of a length on leg stump, turned away to fine leg for a single
short of a good length on middle and off, dropped short of point for a quick single
short of a good length outside off, run down to third man for a single
short of a good length on middle, drops it onto the off side, calls for a single but is sent back
flighted on middle and leg, comes down the track and drives it wide of mid-on for a single
flighted on middle and off, turned wide of midwicket, calls for a single, decides against it after realising it's not there
tossed up on the off stump, defended on the off side
held it back, short on the off and spun away just as the batsman tried to defend it off the back foot
short and wide, cut to deep point
flighted on middle and off, defended on the off side
flighted outside off, pitches short, pushed to extra cover
tossed up on middle and spinning away after pitching, comes forward to defend, misses, clips the thigh pad on the way to the keeper
flighted on middle and off, defended on the off side
flighted on middle, swept to deep square leg
tossed up on middle, defended on the front foot
short and wide, cut away uppishly towards deep point
flat outside off, pushed to cover
flat and quick, bowled full outside off, tries to drive to cover, misses
flighted on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
flighted on middle, comes down the track and drives it wide of long-on
tossed up on middle and off, defended on the leg side
flighted on the off stump, tries to drive but the ball spins away, beaten
driven to cover
flighted on the off stump, gets on the back foot and pushes it towards point for a quick single
full on the off, dropped onto the off side
flighted on the off stump, pushed wide of the bowler
flighted on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long on
flighted on leg stump, tries to drive, gets an inside edge onto the pads
flighted, pitches short on middle and spinning towards off, defended on the back foot
flatter, pitching on middle and leg, defended
flighted on the off stump, defended
short of a good length on middle, pushed to the leg side
flighted on leg stump, driven straight to midwicket
quicker ball on the off stump, defended on the front foot to cover
flighted outside off, spinning away, dragged to midwicket
short on middle and off, pushed to long-on for a single
short outside off, cut away to deep point
flighted on middle and off, driven to long-off for a single
tossed up on middle and leg, comes down the track and pushes it wide of the bowler towards long-on
drooped onto the leg side
pushed to midwicket
pushed off the back foot straight to mid-on
flighted outside off, defended on the off side
short on middle and leg, pushed off the back foot to long-on
flat on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
flighted on leg stump, driven to long on for a single

gone! Sangakkara goes! that was flighted outside off, pitches short of a length, Sangakkara gets on the back foot to cut it past point, gets a thick outside edge that's snapped up easily by Taibu. He makes amends for his spilled chance earlier on and Sri Lanka are in some trouble now!
flighted outside off, pitches short just outside off, defended watchfully
flighted on middle and off, defended on the front foot
tossed up outside off, comes forward to defend, gets a thick edge wide of slip for a single
flighted on middle and leg, defended back to the bowler
flighted on the off stump, driven to long off
flat and quick on middle, went straight on, tries to defend it on the back foot, gets an inside edge onto his pads
flighted outside off, dropped onto the off side
flighted on middle and leg, turned away wide of square leg
flighted outside leg, tries to sweep, misses
on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
and again, shorter in length, defended
flighted on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
tossed up on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
gave it some air on leg stump, turned away wide of deep square leg
short and wide, left alone
full outside leg, sweeps it really fine, well wide of short fine leg for a boundary
full outside leg, tries to sweep again, fails to connect well
flighted outside off, defended on the front foot to point
short of a length on the off and spinning away, defended on the back foot
pitched on leg, tries to work it away on the leg side, is struck high on the pads
full outside off, pushed to cover
flighted on middle and off, defended on the front foot
shorter outside off, dropped onto the off side
full on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
beaten! flighted on the off stump, pitches full and spins away just as he lunges forward to defend
held it back, short of a good length on middle, swept away wide of deep square leg for a couple
flighted on the off stump, defended on the off side
tossed up outside off, guided to point, an overthrow results in a single
short outside off, cut straight to point
flighted on leg stump, defended on the leg side
flighted on middle, defended back to the bowler
short of a good length on middle and off, defended on the leg side
flighted on middle, comes down the track and defends on the off side
defended off the back foot
flighted on middle and off, comes down the track and tries to loft it over mid-on, just about manages to chip it over the fielder there, failed to connect well
short outside off, left alone
short of middle, defended off the back foot
short and wide, cut away to deep point
flighted outside leg, gets on one knee to sweep, misses, is struck on the pads
full and flat outside off, driven straight to extra cover
short on middle and leg, pushed off the back foot to mid-on
flighted on middle and off, defended on the off side
short on the leg stump, worked away wide of mid-on for a single
flat, bowled short outside off, thinks of cutting but backs away at the last moment
on middle and leg, whipped away to deep midwicket
full on middle, pushed wide of mid-on
short on the off stump, played to point
quicker ball on middle, kept really low, just managed to get his bat down in time
flighted on leg stump, driven to long-on
flighted outside off, looks to slog-sweep it over deep midwicket, the ball spins away, misses
swept to short fine leg
short of a good length on middle and off, defended on the back foot
flighted on middle, driven wide of midwicket for a single
tossed up on leg stump, pushed wide of short fine leg for a single
short outside off, pushed to cover
worked away to short fine leg
gets on the front foot to defend, guided wide of second slip
short on the off, defended off the back foot to the bowler
tries to work it down fine, is struck on the pads
short of a good length on leg stump, turned away to deep square leg
flighted on middle and off, defended off the back foot
tossed up on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
short and wide, cut away to deep point
short outside off, punched to cover
flighted on the off stump, defended on the off side
tossed up on middle and leg, pushed wide of square leg for a single
flighted outside off, defended off the back foot
flighted on the off stump, swept to deep square leg
short outside off, tries to cut, mistimes it to mid-off
flighted on the off stump, swept to fine leg
flighted outside off, comes down the track to driven it to long-on, is hit on the pads
short on middle and off, turned wide of midwicket
full outside off, left alone
short outside off, defended on the back foot to the off side
short and a little too wide, given
full outside off, left alone yet again
flighted on middle and off, defended on the off side
flighted on middle, driven back to the bowler
short on the off stump, keeps low, gets an inside edge onto the leg side
short outside off and spinning in, pushed back to the bowler
flighted outside off, comes down the track and defends
arm-ball on the off stump, defended on the back foot on the leg side
short outside off, guided with of short third man for a single
tossed up outside off, driven to long-on for a single
flighted on the off stump, turned away to deep square leg where a fumble allows the batsmen to come back for the second
short on middle and off, punched off the back foot wide of midwicket for a single
flighted on the off stump, pushed wide of square leg for a single
gone! short on middle, Mubarak gets on the back foot and pulls it away straight to Matsikenyeri at square leg who dives low to his right to take a sharp catch
flighted on middle, defended on the leg side
full on middle and leg, turned away wide of midwicket for a single
flighted outside off, driven wide of the bowler for a single to long-on
flighted on the off stump, turned to short fine leg
flighted on the off stump, comes down the track and drives it back to the bowler
tossed up outside off, turned to square leg
flighted on middle and off, pushed wide of square leg for a single
tossed up on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
flighted outside off, driven straight to midwicket
short on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
short outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover
flighted on the off stump, driven to long-on for a single
full toss on the off stump, fails to cash in, drives it straight to cover
short outside off, cut away wide of short third man for a welcome three runs
flighted on the off stump, pushed to midwicket
flighted on middle, comes down the track and drives it uppishly wide of midwicket for a couple
flighted on middle and off, defended on the off side
arm-ball on middle, gets on the back foot and punches it wide of cover for three more
short on middle and off, walks across and pushes it to deep midwicket
flighted on middle, defended onto the off side
bowled from well wide of the crease, straight on middle, defended back to the bowler
pitched short on middle and leg, pushed to square leg
full outside off, comes down the track and tries to push it towards cover, gets a thin edge wide of Taibu and to the third-man boundary, given four byes, the umpire didn't spot the edge
full toss outside off, slashed away straight to point. Should have got that one away
short on the off, pushed to mid-on off the back foot
flighted outside off, driven to long-on for a single
short of a good length on leg, turned away wide of square leg
short on middle and off, pushed to long-on off the back foot
short outside off, waits for the ball and guides it wide of short third man for a couple
flighted on the off stump, swept to deep square leg
wide down the leg side, given
flighted on middle and leg, driven to long on
driven to long on
defended back to the bowler
short on the leg stump, pushed off the back foot to deep midwicket
flatter on middle and leg, dropped onto the leg side for a single
flighted on middle and off, driven back to the bowler
quicker, full on middle and leg, turned away to square leg
flighted outside off, tries to defended it on the off side, gets an inside edge to short fine leg
short outside off, punched off the back foot wide of long-off

gone! run out, flatter from wide of crease on middle and off, dropped onto the off side, Kandamby backs up too far, is halfway down the pitch, Taibu runs forward, picks up the ball and flicks it straight on to the stumps to find Kandamby well short of his ground at the non-strikers end
short on leg stump, pushed wide of square leg for a single
short outside off, guided to short third man for a quick single
short on middle and leg, pulled away to deep midwicket for a single
tossed up on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
bowled 'im! that was slow through the air on middle and off, Kulasekara tries to loft it over mid-off on the back foot, misses, and the off stump takes a beating
good length on middle and leg, flicked wide of square leg for a couple
full on the off stump, driven to mid-off for a quick single
full toss on leg stump, flicked to fine leg for a single
low full toss on leg stump once again, comes forward and turns it away to a squarish fine leg
full on middle and leg, flicked wide of short fine leg for a single
shot! full on middle and leg, lofted well over deep midwicket for Sri Lanka's first six!
full on middle and off, comes forward to defended but gets an outside edge wide of short third man for three runs. Valuable runs for Sri Lanka
flighted on middle and off, spins away, tries to defend, misses

run out, flatter on middle and leg, gets on the back foot and drops it onto the leg side, Murali calls for a single and runs down the pitch but is sent back by Mathews, Taibu runs to his left, picks the ball up and records yet another direct hit at the non-striker's end to find Murali short of his ground
flat on the off stump, dropped onto the off side for a quick single
flighted on middle and off, defended on the off side
flighted on middle and leg, driven back to the bowler
full toss on leg stump, driven down the ground to long on for a couple
slower ball on middle and leg, makes room to loft the ball over mid-off, times it well but fails to get the elevation, hits it straight to Masakadza who takes a good sharp catch.
good length outside off, pushes it back to the bowler who tries to throw down the stumps at the strikers end but misses. Fernando would have been out had that hit
full outside off, gets under it and slices it over the covers for two runs
gone! yorker on middle, Dilhara fails to get his bat down in time to have his stumps rearranged. Sri Lanka bowled out for 152

inn2.comm: runs straightaway, back of a length on middle, gets across and turns it to fine leg for a single
wide down the leg side, false start by Fernando
beaten! excellent comeback, short of a good length on the off stump and moving away just as Sibanda tries to prod at it off the back foot
full on the off stump, driven confidently to mid-off

short of a good length on middle and leg, tries to work it away fine, is hit on the thighs and calls for a single, is sent back but drops on the pitch halfway down, seems to have done his ankle there, the fielder at square leg aims at the stumps but fails to hit, Sibanda struggles back to the crease. He's in a lot of pain here and getting some medical attention
back of a length on middle and leg, turned down to fine leg
good length outside off and moving away, looks to play at it off the back foot but withdraws at the last moment
starts off with a wide down the leg side
inswinger, pitched full on the off and came in, tried to flick it towards square leg but got the leading edge just over the bowlers head
good length on middle and angling down leg, tries to work it away off his pads, misses
full on middle and leg, glanced down to fine leg
full on the off, an inswinger, gets on the front foot to drive with bat really close to pad, pad first and then onto the bat, wide of mid-off for a couple. Was struck outside the line there
close lbw shout, full on middle and leg, tries to drive it wide of mid-on, is struck on the pads and the bowler goes up. The appeal is turned down as the ball seemed to be missing leg stump
short of a good length outside off, defended on the off side
oversteps, full outside off and driven to mid-off
deceived by a slower ball, Sibanda had prepared himself for a big heave over mid-wicket, played the shot too early and was struck on the waist
full on the off stump, square-driven to point who fumbles to allow a single
short on the off, pulled away over midwicket for three runs
full and wide outside off, tries to slice it away over point, misses
full on middle and leg, flicked away uppishly towards fine leg for a couple
appeal for caught-behind,full outside off, on a yorker length, Sibanda looks to drive but gets an outside edge into the ground and to the keeper. The fielders go up but that was a bump ball
down the leg side, pitches on leg and spins down further, evades Sangakkara to the fine leg boundary
wide again, full on leg stump and spinning away, Sangakkara fails to collect behind the wicket

close shout for lbw, pitching full on middle and spinning towards leg, tries to defend on the front foot, misses, is struck in line. Big appeal, but it's turned down, rather surprising. He didn't look like he was trying to play a shot there
flighted outside off, defended on the off side
short outside off, pushed off the back foot
gone this time! full on middle and leg from round the wicket, tries to sweep it away towards square leg, misses, is struck on the back pad in line with middle, the appeal is upheld. That was plumb!
pitching short of a good length on middle and leg, tries to work it away towards short fine leg, hits the pads and drops onto the leg side
fuller on middle and leg, turned away wide of short fine leg for a single
beaten! full outside off, inviting the batsman to drive, Taibu obliges but the ball moves away after pitching to escape the outside edge
full on leg stump and drifting down leg, tries to flick it away, is rapped on the pads
short of a good length outside off, pushed wide of midwicket for a quick single

slower ball outside off, didn't pick it, went through with the attempted slog-sweep over midwicket, the ball lobbed up in the air towards fine leg where Mendis judged the catch to perfection. Zimbabwe lose their openers
full on middle and off, driven back to the bowler
good length on the off stump, tries to drive it back past the bowler, gets an outside edge that falls well short of first slip
flighted on the off stump, comes down the track and push it towards mid-on, is hit on the pads
flighted on middle and leg, driven wide of midwicket for a single
flighted on middle, swept away to fine leg
gone! flighted outside off and spinning towards middle, tries to sweep it towards square leg, misses, and is hit in line with middle. That was absolutely plumb! That was identical to Sibanda's lbw
quicker through the air, pitched full on middle, worked away to fine leg
flat, bowled on a good length on leg stump, tries to drop it onto the leg side, is hit on the pads
shot! full outside off, gets forward and drives it beautifully to the long-off boundary
short and wide, slashes hard, misses. He's overstepped once again
slower ball on middle and leg, walks across to paddle it wide of the short fine leg fielder, is hit on the thighs on the way to the keeper
poor ball, full on the pads, flicked away over square leg for a boundary
full and wide, yorker length, chases it, misses
slower ball bowled on a good length outside off, defended to cover
short of a good length on the off stump, defended on the off side on the back foot
short on middle and off, pushed to square leg
shot! flighted on middle and leg, driven uppishly wide of a diving mid-on for a boundary
flighted on leg stump, gets on the front foot to defend, hit on the pads, that was missing leg

but this was plumb! pitched on a good length outside off, gets on the back foot to defend, misses, and is rapped on the pads as the ball spins towards middle to trap him right in front of the middle stump. No doubt about that one
close shout for lbw, flighted on middle, gets a huge stride forward and plays with his pads, that was going straight on, the umpire shakes his head.
flat and quick outside off, gets outside the line to defend, hit on the pads
good length outside off, left alone
full outside off, driven wide of cover for a couple
short on middle and leg, tries to pull it towards square leg, hit on the arm and the ball drops on the off side, they scramble a quick single
full outside off, comes forward to defend, misses
short ball outside off, offers no shot to that one
bouncer on leg stump, given a wide, a little too high
short of a length outside off, guided down to third man for a single
flighted outside off, comes down the track and drives it powerfully wide of cover for a boundary. Good aggressive batting
topspinner, pitches on the off stump, defended off the back foot
bowled 'im! bowled flat on the off stump, and spinning in sharply, Chigumbura came onto the front foot but failed to bring his bat down in time as the ball whizzed through him and onto the off stump.
flighted outside off, a doosra, gets outside the line to defend, is struck on the pads
flighted outside leg, held its line, Sangakkara fails to collect and five crucial runs for Zimbabwe
bowled flatter on middle, defended on the front foot
doosra again, flighted on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on for a single
short on the leg stump, pulled to square leg
good length on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
slower ball bowled short outside off, pushed wide of point for a quick single
short on middle, tries to hook it behind square, gets a top edge short of fine leg for a single
short of a good length outside off, defended on the front foot to cover
short and wide, chopped down to third man for a single
flighted outside off, gets outside the line to defend, misses as the ball spins away
flighted on the off stump and spinning away, looks to drive, makes no contact
tossed up outside leg, tries to work it away, gets a leading edge onto the off side
shorter outside leg, tries to drop it onto the leg side, is hit on the pads
flighted outside leg, turned straight to short fine leg
flighted on middle and off, defended on the front foot back to the bowler

gone! full on middle and leg, gets on the front foot to turn it away towards square leg, misses it completely and is rapped on the pads walking forward, is hit in line with leg stump and the umpire has no hesitation in raising his finger
short outside off, Utseya has nothing to do with it
short outside off, left alone again
down the leg side, another wide
full outside off, left alone to the keeper
short of a good length on leg stump, is hit on the pads as he tries to glance it down
full on middle and off, driven back past the bowler to mid-off
dropped, flighted outside off, gets forward to push it towards cover, gets the outside edge wide of Jayawardene at slip where he dives full length to his left but fails to hold on
tossed up on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
flighted outside off, defended
short outside off this time, a doosra, left alone
short of a good length on leg stump, flicked towards deep square leg
flat outside off and spinning in, gets outside the line of the off stump to defend,  misses and is struck on the pads. Stifled appeal from Murali turned down
short on leg stump, tries to work it away fine, is hit on the thighs
flighted on leg stump, defended on the leg side
offspinner pitching on leg and turning towards middle, defended on the leg side
beaten! offspinner outside off and spins away as he tries to defend forward
flighted on the off stump, pushed wide of point for a single
flighted on middle and leg, swept to long leg
flighted on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
full outside off, tries to drive it back to the bowler, gets an inside edge onto his pads
flatter, on middle and off, pushed to point
flighted on the leg stump, tries to flick it away fine, clips the pads on the way to fine leg for two leg byes
tossed up outside off, opens the face and guides it to short third man
flighted outside off, gets his front foot across and sweeps it to deep square leg
that spun away, pitching short of a good length on the off stump and evading the outside as he came forward to defend
tossed up on middle and off, gets outside the line and tries to sweep it fine, is hit on the pads, a touch too high there
went straight on, pitched outside off and held its line, defended on the off side
flighted on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
flighted on middle and off, gets on the front foot to defend, gets an inside edge onto his pads
flighted outside off stump, swept away to deep square leg
good length outside of, leaves it alone to the keeper
short of a good length on the off stump, gets forward and defends it towards cover
full on middle and off, defended on the front foot to mid-off
full outside off, defended to cover
short and wide, chopped down to point
short of a good length on middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
flighted outside off, gets an inside edge to short fine leg as he tries to defend on the front foot
short outside off, gets on the back foot and cuts it to point
offspinner bowled short on the leg stump, pushed wide of mid-on for a single
flighted outside off, full, driven wide of point for a couple
flighted on middle, swept away to deep square leg
down the leg side
went straight on, flighted outside off, comes forward to drive, misses
good length outside off, defended on the front foot to cover
fuller this time, opens the face and plays it straight to point
full outside off, pushed wide of cover for a quick single
good length on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
short of a good length on leg stump, comes down the track to drive it wide of mid-on, is hit on the pads and Kulasekara breaks into a rapturous appeal which, sadly for him, yields no results
full on middle and off, defended on the front foot
off spinner on middle and leg, played towards square leg
flighted on middle, comes forward to defend, gets an outside edge towards short third man
flighted on middle and off, gets outside the line to sweep it to square leg, is hit on the pads
short outside off, dropped onto the off side
close shout for lbw, went straight on, pitching on middle and hitting the batsman in line with the stumps as he comes forward to defend. Why wasn't that given?
flighted outside off, swept on the bounce to deep square leg
full on middle, driven towards mid off
short and wide, cut away to third man for a single
full outside leg stump, walks across to glance it down fine, clips the pads on the way to the keeper
short on middle and off, pulls it straight to midwicket
good length on the off stump, pushed off the front foot to point
full toss on the off stump, gets an inside edge towards short fine leg as he tries to push it back to the bowler
legspinner, pitching outside off and spun in, guided wide of point for a single
pitched full on middle and leg, pushed back to the bowler
dropped, legspinner pitching full on middle and leg, swept to short square leg who dives to his right to put down a sharp chance
pushed to the on side
flighted on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
tossed up on middle and off, defended to cover
good length outside off, defended to cover
full outside off, left alone
full outside off, yorker length, tries to dig it out to the off side, misses
short of a good length on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
full on the off stump, defended on the front foot back to the bowler
full outside off, pushed to cover
flighted on middle and off, driven back to the bowler
flighted on middle and leg, driven straight to cover
tries to flick it away, gets the leading edge short of the bowler
flighted outside off, driven to long-off for a single
full toss outside off, driven straight to mid-off
flighted outside off, comes down the track and chips it towards long-on
short of a length on middle and off, defended off the back foot
yorker on middle and off, dug out to the bowler
short of a good length outside off, cuts it between point and cover for a couple
full on middle, defended back to the bowler
slower ball pitched short on the off stump, defended off the back foot to point
yorker on the off stump, dug out to mid-off
flighted on the off stump, defended on the front foot
flighted on middle and leg, plants his foot forward and lofts it over mid on for a couple
flighted on leg stump, pushed into a vacant on-side field for a single
flighted outside off, comes down the track and pushes it back to the bowler
held it back, shorter outside off, defended on the front foot
flighted on the off stump, defended on the leg side
full outside off, pushed wide of point for a single
good length on middle and off, defended on the off side
dropped, slower ball bowled full outside off, comes forward to defend, gets the outside edge and Sangakkara fails to hold on behind the stumps
full on the off stump, pushed to cover
good length outside off, swatted back to the bowler
full outside off, much quicker, tries to push it towards mid-off, misses
flighted, pitches short outside off, gets on the back foot and punches it to long-off
short and wide, cut away to point
flighted on the off stump, defended on the front foot
short outside off, gets on the back foot and cuts it wide of point for a single
tossed up outside off, comes down the track to drive it to long-off, gets an inside edge towards fine leg
full outside off, driven wide of the bowler for a single to long-off
offspinner, pitching on the off and spinning away, left alone
flighted outside off, defended on the off side
wide down the leg side
flighted on middle and off, comes forward to defend, gets the outside edge towards short third man
dropped, held it back, short outside off, tries to defend off the back foot, gets a thin outside edge onto Sangakkara's pads, didn't get down in time
dropped again, short outside off, gets on the back foot to cut it away, gets a thick outside edge that Sangakkara puts down, that's two in a row
defended on the off side
held it back, short on the off  stump, defended back to the bowler
flighted on the off stump, driven to long-on for a single
tossed up on middle and off, defended on the front foot
poor ball, short and wide, cut away wide of point for a couple
flighted on the off stump, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
flighted outside off, driven to deep extra cover for a single
flighted on the off stump, pushed wide of point for a single
offspinner, pitches on a good length on leg and spinning towards middle, defended on the off side
legspinner, pitches full on the off, gets a leading edge short of the bowler as he tries to push it towards midwicket
short and wide, cut away wide of short third man for a couple
spun away after pitching, thought of cutting, but withdrew his bat at the last moment
shot! flighted on middle and off, swept away powerfully wide of deep square leg for an important boundary
short of a good length outside off, dropped onto the off side for a quick single
back of a length on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
short of a good length on leg stump and angling in towards middle, comes down the track and looks to pull it away over midwicket, gets an inside edge onto his thighs
slower ball pitching short of a good length on middle, defended on the off side
big one! short on leg stump, picks the length early, rocks on the back foot and pulls it over deep square leg for a six!
good length on the off stump, drops onto the off side and calls for a quick single, sent back
flighted on middle, defended back to the bowler
short outside off, cut to point
full toss on leg stump, pushed wide of square leg for a single
full toss outside off, punched to deep extra cover
pitched outside leg again, tries to sweep, is struck on the pads
short and wide, makes room and cuts it wide of point for a single
short outside off, legspinner, pushed straight to cover
legspinner bowled fuller on middle, defended on the front foot
flighted outside off and spinning away just as Utseya tries to defend
flighted on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
offspinner, pitched full outside off, defended again
tossed up on middle and off, swept away between deep midwicket and deep square leg for three runs.
pitching short on leg stump from round the wicket, tries to work it away fine, is hit on the pads
flighted, pitched outside leg, a doosra, spinning towards middle, defended on the front foot
shorter on middle and leg, worked away towards square leg for a single
flighted outside off, gets his front foot across and pushes it to the vacant leg side field for a single
flighted on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
tossed up outside off, defended on the front foot towards cover
short of a good length outside leg stump, turned to fine leg
back of a length outside off, run down to third man off the back foot for a single
short outside off, pulled away wide of deep square leg for a couple
slower ball pitching short on leg stump, dropped onto the off side
slower ball outside off, guided to third man for a single
good length on middle, pushed to mid-on for a single
full on middle and leg, driven wide of mid-on for a couple
full outside off, defended to cover
some reverse swing, full on the off stump, pushed wide of point for a single
good length on the off stump, dropped onto the off side for a single
full on leg stump and angling down, tries to flick it away towards square leg, is hit on the pads, Fernando appeals desperately but is silenced by the umpire who shakes his head
short of a good length on the off stump, defended on the off side
flighted on the off stump, pushed to point
short outside off, cut away straight to point, Utseya calls for a single but is sent back wisely
offspinner, flighted on leg stump and spinning towards middle, defended on the front foot
held it  back, shorter on the off stump and spinning away, looks to sweep it away over midwicket, misses
short on the off stump, pushed firmly to deep cover
flighted on middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
short outside off, looks to run it down to third man, misses
and again, tries to open the face, misses once more
short outside off, erring in length, succeeds in getting this one past point and towards third man for a single
full on leg stump and drifting down, tries to flick it away towards square leg, is rapped on the pads
full on the off stump, drive straight to cover
yorker on middle and leg, dug out comfortably
slower ball bowled short outside off, left alone by Dabengwa

bowled 'im! what a timely wicket! that was short on the off stump, kept a touch low, makes room and tries to guide that one down to third man, fails to get his bat down in time and the ball crashes into the off stump.
full on the off stump, gets behind it and drives it to mid-on
good length on the off stump, defended on the front foot
good length outside off, run down to third man for a single
slower ball bowled short outside off, tries to pull it away towards square leg, misses
flat outside off, defended on the front foot
flighted outside off, driven towards extra cover for a single. Price is off strike now
flighted outside off, defended on the front foot
short outside off, pushed to point
flat on middle and leg, turned to short fine leg
doosra, that pitched on middle and spun away, didn't pick it, was beaten as the ball spun away from him
good length outside off, defended off the front foot
full toss on middle, driven back firmly onto the stumps at the non-strikers end, a touch unfortunate there, he timed that really well
short outside off, pulled away to deep square leg
yorker on the off stump, gets his bat down just in time to dig it out to the off side
gone! good length on the off stump and angling in towards middle, gets forward to defend, misses, and is struck in line with middle and off, that looked out and the umpire had no doubt
gone! full toss on middle, tries to drive it wide of mid-on, gets a leading edge straight to mid-off where Mendis takes a comfortable catch
flighted on the off stump, defended to the leg side
flighted on the off stump, defended yet again
short outside off, going the other way, guided to short third man
tossed up on the off stump, defended on the off side
doosra, bowled outside off from round the wicket, Price didn't pick it

gone! Murali takes five, his 10th five-wicket haul, that was quicker through the air, pitched on a good length outside off and spun in sharply, Price came forward to defend but failed to make contact, was struck on the pads and in line with middle and the umpire didn't take too long to raise his finger
